dish of the day

  • Fried Fish

    by maha elmasry

    29/9/2015

    salmon fish

  • Fried Fish

    by maha elmasry

  • Fried Fish

    by maha elmasry

  • Fried Fish

    by maha elmasry

  • Fried Fish

    by maha elmasry

dish competitors

Ingredients

  • 2 eggs, lightly beaten
  • 1-1/2 cups crushed saltines (about 45 crackers)
  • 2 pounds whitefish fillets, cut in half lengthwise
  • Oil for frying
  • TARTAR SAUCE:
  • 1 cup mayonnaise
  • 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish
  • 1 tablespoon finely chopped onion
  • My Savings Add to Grocery List
